summary:
My first mod!
It's completely done, I will not update this mod more!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a Dungeon next to Riverwood, i have put allot of time on this mod so it should be good.

This mod is kind of Complete so i wont do any updates any time soon!

It may have some bugs.
(Keep your eye out if you happen to find any)

You can see the Dungeon location on the world map in the Images

There is a lever to withdraw the spikes to enter the mine,
you have to locate the lever your self, I cant just say where it is you know.

There is 1 enemy in the mine and that is a DragonPriest

There are:
5 ebony ore veins
6 gold ore veins
in the Mine

[size=4]YOU CAN USE THIS MOD HOWEVER YOU LIKE! (just credit me as the original author!)[/size]

Hope you guys/girls like it =)

[color=#ff4500][size=4]!!!!This Mod Uses The Dragonborn DLC!!!![/size][/color]
author: Minimango
